summary: A down on his luck engineer gets involved in an adventure with a mysterious woman and an emerald magnate.
cast: Ryan O'Neal|Anne Archer|Omar Sharif|Domingo Ambriz|John Larroquette|Philip Stone|Michael Sheard|Enrique Lucero|Manuel Ojeda|Tara Fellner|Sandra Kerns|Raúl Martínez|Enrique Novi|Miguel Ángel Fuentes|Delroy White
title: Hielo verde
